name: [WIP] Isekai Hero
description:
Are you killed by a car accident? Do you have short black/brown hair and soft yet generic facial features? If so, get reincarnated and save the world today (for free).

Uploading level 1 for now. Will add more later.

Credits:

Sprites:

Hero "Animated Pixel Adventurer" by rvros https://rvros.itch.io/animated-pixel-hero 

Monsters "Grotto Escape Game Art Pack" by ansimuz http://ansimuz.com/site/portfolio/grotto-escape-chibi-monsters/

Girl character "[Verboten Arcane Stash] Mini Characters" by Atelier Pixerelia https://atelier-pixerelia.art/

Tileset "Free Pixel Art Nature Platformer Tileset" by Moon Empire https://moonempire.itch.io/free-pixel-art-nature-platformer-tileset
